name: react-server-render
description: Several years ago, I encountered a project where the mobile version suffered from slow load times. To address this, we initiated a research project aimed at improving performance. Our initial efforts involved caching the JavaScript bundle in the browser and splitting it into multiple files. As a next step, we explored server-side rendering (SSR) to see if it could further enhance performance. In this section, I'll review our findings regarding server-side rendering technologies.

scripts.start: webpack --config webpack.server.js && webpack --config webpack.client.js && node dist/server.bundle.js

author: Samuel Zhang
